full_output.summary: I am Rachit Agarwal, a dedicated and passionate third-year student pursuing a degree of Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE AI&ML). My journey in the field of technology has been driven by a deep fascination for Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) and a love for programming languages. I am particularly proficient in C++, Python, and JavaScript, and I'm continually expanding my skillset to encompass backend technologies. I'm eager to contribute my coding and problem-solving abilities to innovative projects and grow as a professional in the ever-evolving tech world.

projects.name: Real Estate Property Search Platform
projects.description: Developed a dynamic real estate property search platform using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. The platform offers users an intuitive and responsive interface for searching and viewing nearby properties. Improved the user experience by integrating Google Maps for location visualization and adding advanced search filters.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Utilized HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP to develop responsive and user-friendly web pages, enhancing the overall user experience. Identified and resolved performance bottlenecks, optimizing page load times by 40% through the implementation of lazy loading techniques.

experiences.description: Developed a novel version of a heap data structure in Java for Walmarts shipping department, showcasing strong problem-solving and algorithmic skills. Designed a UML class diagram for a data processor, considering different operating modes and database connections. Created an entity relationship diagram to design a new database accounting for all requirements provided by Walmarts pet department.

Completed a simulation focused on identifying cyber security threats at ANZ. Investigated e-mails to report suspicious items. Analyzed a Packet Capture file using an open source tool to identify and investigate any potential threats.

full_output.name: Rachit Agarwal
achievements_and_awards: Campus Ambassador in Techfest, IIT Bombay 2023
